install.name: JW FLV (Version 4) Player
install.author: Highwood Design
install.description: Adds JW FLV (Version 4) support to hwdVideoShare

field.name: bgcolor
field.description: The background color of the controlbar and playlist. This is white with the default skin.
field.label: Background Color

field.name: fgcolor
field.description: The color of all icons and texts in the controlbar and playlist.
field.label: Foreground Color

field.name: lightcolor
field.description: The color of an icon or text when you rollover it with the mouse. If you set this, also set the frontcolor, so the rollovers also have a rollout.
field.label: Light Color

field.name: screencolor
field.description: The background color of the display.
field.label: Screen Color

field.name: controlbar
field.description: Position of the controlbar.
field.label: Control bar

field.name: logo
field.description: Location of a logo image.
field.label: Logo

field.name: skin
field.description: The location of a skin SWF file.
field.label: Skin

field.name: autostart
field.description: Automatically start playing.
field.label: Autostart

field.name: link
field.description: Link to an external site.
field.label: Link URL

field.name: linktarget
field.description: The browser frame where link from the display are opened in.
field.label: Link Target

field.name: bufferlength
field.description: Number of seconds to buffer before starting.
field.label: Buffer length

field.name: displayclick
field.description: Action to perform when clicking the display.
field.label: Display Click

field.name: fullscreen
field.description: Enable the fullscreen functionality.
field.label: Allow Fullscreen

field.name: mute
field.description: Mute the player on startup.
field.label: Mute

field.name: quality
field.description: Toggle high-quality playback.
field.label: High Quality

field.name: repeat
field.description: Continously repeat playback.
field.label: Repeat

field.name: stretching
field.description: Resize mode of display content.
field.label: Stretching

field.name: volume
field.description: Startup volume.
field.label: Volume

field.name: pseudostreaming
field.description: The biggest advantage of using pseudostreaming or any other streaming solution is the ability to seek in the timeline to positions that have not been downloaded yet to the player. This is most desirable for full-length movies because the visitor can seek to the last scene of a 2-hour movie if she wants to.
field.label: Allow Pseudostreaming

field.name: start
field.description: Position in seconds where the playback should start. Only used when streaming.
field.label: Start Time

field.name: captions
field.description: Display captions in the video player
field.label: Enable Captions

field.name: pl_show
field.description: Show the internal playlist fetaures.
field.label: Show Playlist Features

field.name: pl_position
field.description: Location of the internal playlist fetaures.
field.label: Playlist Position

field.name: googleanalytics
field.description: The Google Analytics plugin for the JW Player is designed to help you understand how well your video content is performing online. It takes advantage of Google's new Flash API for Analytics so you can track events within the JW Player itself.
field.label: Enable Google Analytics

field.name: abouttext
field.description: Custom text for the Right Click on the video player. (Only users who have a licensed version of the JW FLV Player will be able to use this option.)
field.label: About Text

field.name: aboutlink
field.description: Custom link for the Right Click on the video player. (Only users who have a licensed version of the JW FLV Player will be able to use this option.)
field.label: About Link
